sections.text: La vie d'une œuvre is an interactive experience linked to the Petite Galerie du Louvre and its exhibition "Figure d'artiste" which ran from September 2019 to June 2020.

sections.title: What is it ?
sections.text: La vie d'une œuvre is an immersive experience based on Vigée Le Brun's painting "La Paix ramenant l'Abondance". Throughout this experience, you will visit some of the places that hosted this creation and discover its impact on the art world.

sections.title: Context
sections.text: This project was produced as part of a two-week workshop between the Petite Galerie du Louvre and my bachelor's program at the École des Gobelins. I made it with Emilien Vandevelde as a developer by my side, and two designers, Vincent Calas and Chloélia Breton.

sections.title: Tech
sections.text: This project was made without javascript framework except ThreeJS for webgl. I had a great time creating custom shaders for transitions and object reveals. I also spent time finding ways reduce the size of assets. The website has a huge amount of textures and I found ways to reduce the load time an its impact on the UX.
